black_eyed_susan.jpg.funFact: It is the state flower of Maryland and symbolizes encouragement.

common_sunflower.jpg.funFact: Sunflowers are hyperaccumulators, meaning they can pull toxins like lead and arsenic from the soil.

hardy_fuchsia.jpg.funFact: Named after 16th-century German botanist Leonhart Fuchs.

autumn_crocus.jpg.funFact: Despite the name, it is not a true crocus and is actually a member of the lily family.

scarlet_sage.jpg.funFact: This plant is a favorite of hummingbirds due to its nectar-rich, tubular red flowers.
